mapper.select: SELECT tb_data_img.img_idx, tb_data_img.img_title, tb_user.user_nick, tb_object_img.created_at, tb_object_img.data_class, tb_data_img.img_id, first_img.img_url AS img_url FROM tb_data_img JOIN tb_user ON tb_data_img.user_id = tb_user.user_id JOIN tb_object_img ON tb_data_img.img_id = tb_object_img.img_id JOIN (SELECT img_id, img_url FROM tb_object_img WHERE (img_id, created_at) IN ( SELECT img_id, MIN(created_at) AS earliest_time FROM tb_object_img GROUP BY img_id ) ) AS first_img ON tb_data_img.img_id = first_img.img_id WHERE tb_data_img.img_class = #{search};
SELECT * FROM tb_data_img JOIN tb_user ON tb_data_img.user_id = tb_user.user_id WHERE tb_user.user_id = #{user_id}
